TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HScrollBar extends System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar

summary.span: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表的 Windows 窗体 。

span.span: Represents a Windows Forms that can be added to a Microsoft Office Excel worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于。The is different from a . 具有支持可将其添加到 Excel 工作表并，使其具有更多的方法和属性的其他成员。The has additional members that enable it to be added to an Excel worksheet and that give it additional methods and properties. 不要使用`New`构造函数来创建一个新。Do not use the `New` constructor to create a new . 使用方法添加新向工作表中。Use the method to add a new to a worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Z 顺序由集合。The z-order is determined by the collection. 在所有对象集合，该对象在 z 顺序的底层在*集合*(1)，并在 z 顺序的前面该对象是*集合*(*集合*。`Count`)。In any collection of objects, the object at the back of the z-order is *collection*(1), and the object at the front of the z-order is *collection*(*collection*.`Count`). ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see . 中的所有控件命名空间具有在功能上等效`ZOrder`属性。All controls in the namespace have a functionally equivalent `ZOrder` property.
